channel.title: Whonix-Workstation: The Firewall does NOT run
channel.description:
Hi there,
I have a question related to the Whonix-Workstation: Reading the DOCS it was my understanding that the Whonix-Workstation should be [b]Firewalled[/b].
But running the following command on my Whonix-Workstation I got the following result:
user@host:~$ [b]sudo iptables -L -n -v[/b]
Chain INPUT (policy ACCEPT 0 packets, 0 bytes) pkts bytes target prot opt in out source destination
Chain FORWARD (policy ACCEPT 0 packets, 0 bytes) pkts bytes target prot opt in out source destination
Chain OUTPUT (policy ACCEPT 0 packets, 0 bytes) pkts bytes target prot opt in out source destination
So for my understanding the IPTABLES' s firewall-rule-set is empty.
Am I right? And if so why is my Whonix-Workstations' s FW not running? Or am I doing something wrong?
Thank you for your help Meike
